TextView.android:text: - Chemo car is a technical cum fun event with basic elements of chemistry aiming to run a model car on chemical fuel based on a chemical reaction. Automobiles and Vehicles carrying load have a great importance in the transportation of raw materials. Itâ€™s imperative to have an innovative design and the capability to withstand load in their designs. Make use of your mental faculties and design a vehicle powered by a chemical energy source that can carry a specified amount of load as well as be accurate.

There will be three rounds for this competition 
 1. Competitors must use 500 ml plastic water bottle only. (No soft drink bottle is allowed)
 2. Maximum time of 3 minutes will be given for a single attempt.
 3. It must run with the chemicals only. No batteries are allowed as the power source.
 4. Participants have to bring sufficient amount of chemicals as per requirements. No explosive, hazardous or harmful chemicals should be used for the chemical reaction. Complete measures of safety must be taken care of.
 5. The car must be an autonomous vehicle and cannot be controlled remotely. Giving a push to start the vehicle or using a mechanical starting device is not allowed.
 6. Track will be given to all the teams for trial runs before the actual competition starts.
 7. In case a team fails to cross the minimum distance. The team will be given a Two trail per round.
 8. There is no limitation to the dimensions of the car.
 9. No materials will be made available from the host institute.
 10. Strict discipline should be maintained during the event. Any misbehaviour will lead to disqualification. Violation of any rule will be followed by instant disqualification.
 11. In case of any dispute, organizers decision will be final.
